title: DVlog
author: DVlog
created_time: September 24, 2023, 10:16:47 PMLast edit: September 24, 2023, 10:54:57 PM by DVlog
content: I took this screenshot from my recent merit list. I was merited in this topic: Scammers are getting innovative. But when i checked in my recent merit history it shows (Deleted/Off-limits/Ignored). The topic is still there so it is not deleted. It's not off-limits as well. The only option remains is Ignored. So ignored by who? Moderators? I am sorry if this topic has been posted before to the forum.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: I think you are mistaken this for something else. I have just gone through your recent merit history and I saw nothing like deleted post there.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I just clicked on your merit history now, and I can't fine any off-limit or deleted post-merit. If you are seeing that from your end, it's possible that you have ignored that topic and not the moderator ignoring them. Sometime we can mistakenly click on ignore user without realising it, or you might have tried to create an ignore board and you included the topic you receive your merit from. Those are just the possible explanations I can think of.

Thanks for pointing out the real reasons, and it's silly that sometimes we fail to notice small changes and get confused about what just happens.The problem has been resolved, but I will keep this post open so that interested people can continue their discussions.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: DVlog on September 24, 2023, 10:48:16 PMThe problem has been resolved, but I will keep this post open so that interested people can continue their discussions.If your case has been resolved, then I don't see any reason why you need to keep the thread unlocked, unless you need further explanation or a reply from a few members who might not be patient enough to read through the first two lines and might just repeat what has been said, or better yet, give suggestions based on what they think is the fault.To me, the best thing to do is to lock the thread if you are truly satisfied with the answer you got.

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: You usually see this if the post which got merit is in a place you don't have access to, like Staff Forum or Trashcan. I see your post is not deleted though.
